description:
Want to Take Photos Like a Pro with your Nikon D5000? The answer will now be in on your TouchPad.

With TouchPad Camera Guides from QuickPro, you'll never have to miss the shot of your life again. Whether it’s that birthday surprise, graduation ceremony, or your daughters' wedding day, the ability to take a photo like a Pro is within reach.

QuickPro Camera Guides, the leading producer of Camera Guide tutorials, introduces the Nikon D5000. Now you have ready to go instruction of all the Nikon D5000 camera functions where you need it and when you need it. Really want to capture the Coliseum and Pantheon on your trip to Rome? Take along your TouchPad and, while you're on the plane, enjoy a Pro training session with a QuickPro Camera Guide specialist.

Provides:
- Instructional video on all aspects of the camera and photography
- On the go video playback. No WIFI required after initial install for watching in the field.
- Chapter driven

Subjects Include:
- Camera Overview
- Battery
- Mount Lens
- Installing the Memory Card
- Format a Memory Card
- Shooting Modes
- Portrait Mode
- Landscape Mode
- Child Mode
- Sports Mode
- Close Up Mode
- Night Portrait
- Auto Focus Modes
- Menu Options
- Release Modes
- RAW vs. JPEG
- Setting Image Quality
- Protecting Images
- ISO
- White Balance Theory
- Automatic Options - White Balance
- Custom White Balance
- AF Shooting Modes
- Focus Area Selection
- AF Area Mode
- Focus Lock
- Metering Modes
- Exposure Elements
- Depth of Field
- P-Mode
- S-Mode
- A-Mode
- Auto Exposure
- Exposure Compensation
- Exposure in Manual Mode
- Bracketing
- Using Flash
- Histogram
- M-Mode
- Camera Shake
- Preventing Digital Noise
- Shooting a Movie
- Angle and Magnification
- Lenses
- Review Portrait
- Review Landscape
- Review Sporting Events

This training content was produced by QuickPro, LLC. This product is not sponsored by Nikon, Corp. or its subsidiaries. Nikon Product Names and terminology are trademarks of Nikon, Corp.
